resources.string: This screen shows current stats from your steam profile. Unfortunately, at this point, it seems your steam ID is not properly set up in settings. Please visit settings page and input your ID (connection for verification and downloading stats is required.)\n\nInstructions on how to find/set up steam ID can be found on picture below.
Android internal problem with getting saved preferences. Please try killing and restarting the application and contact the developer.
ID specified in setting does not exist on steam network. Typo?
ID is stored in settings, but there was an error confirming it (network/steam API error). Please try updating from menu above.
